CustomField.description: LEM-25383: This Id represents Selection Intel’s grouping of related stores. All stores are given a nTAM value, then multi-location stores are grouped by chain Id to drive Deck Ranks and prioritization. This is only used for initial store creation as hierarchies are subject to change by Sales.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Represents Selection Intel’s grouping of related stores. All stores are given a nTAM value, then multi-location stores are grouped by chain Id to drive Deck Ranks and prioritization. This is only used for initial store creation as hierarchies are subject to change by Sales.
CustomField.label: Selection Intel Chain Id
